00041 
00043 class MESQUITE_EXPORT MsqLine 
00044 {
00045   private:
00046     Vector3D mPoint;
00047     Vector3D mDirection; // unit direction
00048   
00049   public:
00050   
00051     MsqLine( const Vector3D& point, const Vector3D& dir )
00052       : mPoint(point), mDirection(dir/dir.length())
00053     {}
00054     
00055     MsqLine()
00056       : mPoint(0,0,0), mDirection(0,0,0)
00057     {}
00058     
00059     static
00060     MsqLine two_point( const Vector3D& p1, const Vector3D& p2 )
00061       { return MsqLine( p1, p2 - p1 ); }
00062     
00063     const Vector3D& point() const { return mPoint; }
00064     const Vector3D& direction() const { return mDirection; }
00065     
00067     Vector3D point( double param ) const 
00068       { return point() + param * direction(); }
00069     
00071     double closest( const Vector3D& from_point ) const
00072       { return mDirection % (from_point - mPoint); }
00073       
00074     double distance( const Vector3D& from_point ) const
00075       { return (point(closest(from_point)) - from_point).length(); }
00076       
00079     bool intersect( const MsqLine& other, double& param, double epsilon ) const;
00080     
00082     bool closest( const MsqLine& other, double& param ) const;
00083 };

00086 class MESQUITE_EXPORT MsqCircle
00087 {
00088   private:
00089     Vector3D mCenter;
00090     Vector3D mNormal; 
00091     double mRadius;
00092 
00093   public:
00094   
00095     MsqCircle()
00096       : mCenter(0,0,0), mNormal(0,0,0), mRadius(0)
00097       {}
00098   
00099     MsqCircle( const Vector3D& center, const Vector3D& normal, double radius )
00100       : mCenter(center), mNormal(normal/normal.length()), mRadius(radius) 
00101       {}
00102       
00105     static
00106     bool three_point( const Vector3D& p1, 
00107                       const Vector3D& p2, 
00108                       const Vector3D& p3, 
00109                       MsqCircle& result );
00110       
00113     static
00114     bool two_point( const Vector3D& center, 
00115                     const Vector3D& p1, 
00116                     const Vector3D& p2, 
00117                     MsqCircle& result );
00118                                          
00119     const Vector3D& center() const { return mCenter; }
00120     const Vector3D& normal() const { return mNormal; }
00121     double radius() const          { return mRadius; }
00122     
00124     Vector3D radial_vector() const;
00125     
00128     Vector3D closest( const Vector3D& point ) const;
00129     
00133     bool closest( const Vector3D& point,
00134                   Vector3D& point_on_circle,
00135                   Vector3D& tangent_at_point ) const;
00136 };

00140 class MESQUITE_EXPORT MsqPlane
00141 {
00142   private:
00143     Vector3D mNormal; 
00144     double mCoeff;
00145   
00146   public:
00147   
00148     MsqPlane( const Vector3D& normal, double coeff );
00149     MsqPlane( const Vector3D& normal, const Vector3D& point );
00151     MsqPlane( double a, double b, double c, double d );
00152     
00154     const Vector3D& normal() const { return mNormal; }
00155     
00157     double coefficient() const { return mCoeff; }
00158     
00160     Vector3D point() const { return -mCoeff * mNormal; }
00161     
00163     double distance( const Vector3D& point ) const
00164       { return fabs( normal() % point + coefficient() ); }
00165       
00167     Vector3D closest( const Vector3D& point ) const
00168       { return point - normal() * (normal() % point + coefficient()); }
00169     
00172     bool intersect( const MsqPlane& plane, MsqLine& result ) const;
00173 
00176     bool intersect( const MsqLine& line, double& line_param ) const;
00177 };

00180 class MESQUITE_EXPORT MsqSphere
00181 {
00182   private:
00183     Vector3D mCenter;
00184     double mRadius;
00185   
00186   public:
00187   
00188     MsqSphere( const Vector3D& center, double radius )
00189       : mCenter(center), mRadius(radius) {}
00190     
00191     const Vector3D& center() const { return mCenter; }
00192     double radius() const { return mRadius; }
00193     
00196     Vector3D closest( const Vector3D& point ) const;
00197     
00198       
00202     bool closest( const Vector3D& point, 
00203                   Vector3D& point_on_sphere,
00204                   Vector3D& normal_at_point ) const;
00205                   
00206     double distance( const Vector3D& point ) const
00207       { return fabs( (center() - point).length() - radius() ); }
00208     
00211     bool intersect( const MsqPlane& plane, MsqCircle& result ) const;
00212                   
00215     bool intersect( const MsqSphere& sphere, MsqCircle& result ) const;
00216 };
